recipes.name: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.author: Chef John
instructions: Boil the spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs and cheese.
Cook pancetta until crispy, then remove from heat.
Toss spaghetti with pancetta and egg mixture off heat.
Serve with extra cheese and pepper.

comments.content: Absolutely delicious! My family loved it.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipes.author: Chef Emily
instructions: Heat oil in a pan and sauté garlic until fragrant.
Add vegetables and stir-fry until tender-crisp.
Add soy sauce and toss to coat.
Serve hot over rice or noodles.

comments.content: Fresh and tasty! A healthy meal.

recipes.name: Chicken Alfredo
recipes.author: Chef Sarah
instructions: Cook fettuccine according to package instructions.
Sauté garlic in olive oil, add chicken and cook until done.
Add cream and cheese, and stir until creamy.
Toss fettuccine with sauce and serve.

recipes.name: Beef Tacos
recipes.author: Chef Maria
instructions: Cook ground beef with onion and bell pepper.
Add taco seasoning and cook for another 5 minutes.
Fill taco shells with beef mixture and top with lettuce, cheese, and sour cream.

recipes.name: Margherita Pizza
recipes.author: Chef Luigi
instructions: Spread tomato sauce over the dough.
Top with mozzarella and basil.
Bake in a preheated oven at 220°C for 10-12 minutes.
Drizzle with olive oil before serving.

recipes.name: Grilled Salmon
recipes.author: Chef Emma
instructions: Season salmon with salt and pepper.
Grill on medium heat for 4-5 minutes on each side.
Serve with lemon slices and fresh dill.

recipes.name: Chocolate Brownies
recipes.author: Chef Ben
instructions: Melt chocolate and butter together.
Stir in sugar, eggs, vanilla, and salt.
Add flour and mix until smooth.
Bake at 180°C for 25 minutes.

recipes.name: Caesar Salad
recipes.author: Chef Lauren
instructions: Chop the lettuce and place in a bowl.
Add croutons and parmesan.
Toss with Caesar dressing before serving.

recipes.name: French Onion Soup
recipes.author: Chef Pierre
instructions: Sauté onions in butter until caramelized.
Add beef broth and simmer for 30 minutes.
Serve with baguette slices topped with melted gruyère.

recipes.name: Pad Thai
recipes.author: Chef Aroon
instructions: Cook noodles according to package instructions.
Sauté shrimp and scrambled eggs.
Add noodles, sauce, and bean sprouts; toss to combine.
Serve with peanuts and lime wedges.

recipes.name: Garlic Butter Shrimp
recipes.author: Chef Angela
instructions: Melt butter in a pan and add garlic.
Sauté shrimp until pink.
Garnish with parsley and lemon wedges.

recipes.name: Avocado Toast
recipes.author: Chef Bella
instructions: Toast the bread.
Mash avocado and season with salt, pepper, and lemon juice.
Spread on toast and garnish with chili flakes.
